profile:
Align Heating is an independently owned business, founded by a certified HVAC and gas installation technician. After working in the industry for many years, our founder started this business to provide personal service to all customers. No issue is too big or too small. We are always ready to discuss the best heating and cooling options for you.

Align Heating is comprised of a dedicated team of professionals whose number one priority is making your home or office as comfortable as possible. We work hard to ensure you have the optimal indoor air quality you deserve. We are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, because we know emergencies can happen at any time.

Our service area includes Mississauga, Oakville and Vaughan. We provide custom installation, repair, and maintenance services on a wide array of heating and cooling equipment including furnaces, water heaters, fireplaces, and pool heaters. We are registered with the Technical Standards & Safety Authority (TSSA). This means, as a certified contractor, our company adheres to the highest level of standards when handling gas and fuel, because your safety is our top priority.

At Align Heating, our goal is to build lifetime relationships with our customers. Our success is built on providing you with service that exceeds your expectations. When you have questions or concerns about your heating and cooling equipment, contact us for a free in-home consultation. We promise to keep working until you are satisfied with the solution.
services:
Furnace repair and installation
Fireplace maintenance and repair 
water heater and tankless water heater repair and installation 
Humidifier repair and installation
Swimming pool heater repair and installation
